    • isUnderDollar

      public boolean isUnderDollar()
      The isUnderDollar method checks if the balance is under a dollar.
      Returns:
      true if under a dollar, false if not.

    • isDollar

      public boolean isDollar()
      Checks if the user wins or loses. Exactly 1 dollar is a win, anything over is a loss.
      Returns:
      true if balance is a dollar, false if it is above.
